name: Robot Warehouse Keeper
description:
You are a newly-hired maintenance worker at Robot Warehouse, the most advanced automation company in the world probably. When the elevator breaks down before your shift ends, you must brave the depths of the warehouse, where no person has performed any upkeep in decades. Fortunately, with the help of your trusty supervisor, Ms. Boss, you are able to link your mind to nearby robots, and control them by synchronizing their motion with your own.

This is a submission for United Game Jam. The theme is "TWO". In this game, you play as two characters at the same time.

Made in Godot v3.2.1. All programming and pixel art (except the font) were done by me during the jam.

This is my first game I've ever finished, and my first game jam!

Thank you to everyone who plays it!

Web Version (v1.1): https://krscott.github.io/two-game-jam-demo/

Releases

v1.0: Initial Submission (.exe and wasm)

v1.1: Uncheesed Edition (.exe)
Added some fixes to prevent some cheesing, but was not uploaded until after the submission time. (Technically within the extension, but I didn't have problems uploading, so not sure if that would count for me.) Play whichever you think is fair.
